title: If you can see the future, is it something you get better at as time goes along? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming you can see as far ahead as you desire, you'd change your future actions to have the best outcome in your life. Doing this repeatedly would improve your decision-making skills so you'd need less time looking into the future to determine the best outcome. So, ironically, the more time you spend looking into the future, the less time you need to spend looking into the future. Side note: what happens if you look into the future and see your future self looking into the future?
